lines.text: At first I thought setting his own apartment on fire didn’t make any sense except as an accident, but…
That Emergency Exit spell! Walking through fires to teleport!
If he wanted to get away from the guy blocking the door and pointing a gun at him…
He could set something on fire and cast the spell! Get the heck out of dodge!
And he just happened to have a lit candle to do it with?
Well, it’s pretty obvious they were in the middle of setting up some kind of ritual when Slick showed up.
He’d probably just lit that candle, and was getting ready to use it to light the others.
So… then what? He lit himself on fire?
Uh. I’m not sure. He might’ve gone to go light the hay on fire? Or maybe he just used his own robes, yeah.
Either way, it sure didn’t work the way he wanted.
Something went wrong, and the blaze went out of control, huh?
Hm… let me think about that one.
